attributes.action: Investigate and end the greed of energy companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
While I do not struggle to pay my energy bills, many people, and especially pensioners do.

Today 21/02/08 British Gas announced huge profits of £571 million.

It is time for the corporate greed to end. It is not in the interest of the citizens of this country to be held to ransom by energy suppliers. 

Clearly the market is not working.

Gas and Electric is an everyday necessity not a luxury. The soaring cost to the domestic consumer has and will lead to serious consequences for some, even death as they cannot afford to stay warm.

Those on low incomes, the sick and disabled need to be protected from such greed. And now with the latest price rises so do working families.

It is time something was done, for the good of the people of this country.

The interests of the people shoud come before those of sharholders.

Enough is enough!!!!
